llm_res.rule: transfer(address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success) - Callers MUST handle false from returns (bool success). Callers MUST NOT assume that false is never returned!

transferFrom(address _from, address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success) - The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
